columns.name: id
columns.description: The ID of the policy definition.

columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the policy definition.

columns.name: display_name
columns.description: The user-friendly display name of the policy definition.

columns.name: mode
columns.description: The policy definition mode. Some examples are All, Indexed, Microsoft.KeyVault.Data.

columns.name: policy_type
columns.description: The type of policy definition. Possible values are NotSpecified, BuiltIn, Custom, and Static. Possible values include: 'NotSpecified', 'BuiltIn', 'Custom', 'Static'.

columns.name: metadata
columns.description: The policy definition metadata.  Metadata is an open ended object and is typically a collection of key value pairs.

columns.name: parameters
columns.description: The parameter definitions for parameters used in the policy rule. The keys are the parameter names.
